word_mean: 不同物理实体在物理上的互相连接（包括网络间的连接和设备或物理媒体间的连接）。

entry.def: If you say that there is an interconnection between two or more things, you mean that they are very closely connected.

example.tran: 这些故事主题之间的相互关联

example.ex: ...the alarming interconnection of drug abuse and AIDS infection.
example.tran: 滥用毒品与艾滋病感染之间让人警醒的关联

means.word_mean: 1. a state of being connected reciprocally;
2. (computer science) the act of interconnecting (wires or computers or theories etc.)
